What is this app?
This is a music player that I wrote for myself, in accordance with my vision of how a music player should look like.
If you find an error, %1$s about it.
If you feel that some features are missing, %1$s about it, but I can\'t promise that I necessarily implement it. Usually I do after a while.

Is this app completely free?
Yes, no ads, no in-app purchases. Perhaps if this app becomes highly popular I could implement some paid non-essential features, but I definitely won\'t add ads or lock existing functionality.

Has this app any analytics or data collection?
No analytics or something else. This app even hasn\'t internet connection permission. (At least until implementation features that requires internet connection.) %2$s.

Translations
All translations are provided only by users. If you find an error in app texts or want to offer translation to your language, %3$s about it.

Source code
Application source code is can be viewed %4$s. Also there can be viewed app known issues/plans.


----------------------------------------------
Frequently Asked Questions
----------------------------------------------

Where is habitual for music players big cover screen?
High amount of similar looking apps with big covers screens was one of the main reason for creation this app. I don\'t like big cover, it just takes screen space. Let there be current play queue in this place.

Where are repeat/shuffle buttons?
Bottom panel can be opened by click or gesture. These buttons are placed there.
